basics.name: Sameer Gupta
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: An aspiring Software Engineer specializing in backend development, machine learning, and data systems. Currently a 4th year student at IIIT-Delhi pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering.

education.institution: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi

work.name: Microsoft, Hyderabad
work.summary: Developed a secure, full-stack web application to assist Designated Response Individuals (DRIs), utilizing Azure for machine learning and production deployment pipeline. Contributed to a 30% reduction in resolution time for DRIs.

work.name: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi
work.summary: Developing a near real-time machine learning competition/tournament platform using Indian financial market data under the guidance of Dr. Gautam Shroff. Leveraged machine learning ensemble techniques to improve equity prediction accuracy.

work.name: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi
work.summary: Trained deep learning models (Vision Transformers and 3D ResNets) to predict ER, PR, and HER2 biomarkers from breast cancer images. Worked on improving early-stage breast cancer diagnosis in a joint project with MAX Healthcare.

projects.name: F&O Trading System
projects.summary: Developed an end-to-end proprietary trading system using Angel Broking platform to execute option straddle strategy, with automated trade execution, order management, and exit strategies.

projects.name: Distributed Systems
projects.summary: Implemented distributed systems using gRPC for a shopping platform, ZeroMQ for group messaging, and RabbitMQ for a YouTube application. Also worked on Raft implementation for geo-distributed Database clusters and MapReduce framework for K-means clustering.

projects.name: NerdLabs
projects.summary: Developed a robust E-commerce Database Management System for a computer parts store, including product catalog, customer management, order processing, inventory control, and review systems. Optimized database schema and query performance.

projects.name: Recommendation System
projects.summary: Implemented User-User and Content-Based Collaborative Filtering algorithms using the Jester Dataset to recommend jokes based on user preferences.

awards.title: Ranked 2nd Worldwide at WreckCTF 2022 with d4rkcOde (College Cybersecurity Team)
Ranked 4th Worldwide at Digital Overdose CTF 2022 with d4rkcOde (College Cybersecurity Team)

volunteer.summary: Taught underprivileged children basic computer skills and programming concepts, along with Maths.

certificates.name: Fundamentals of Machine Learning in Finance
Guided Tour of Machine Learning in Finance
Overview of Advanced Methods of Reinforcement Learning in Finance
Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning in Finance Specialization
